root.name: TRON 2.0: Killer App
root.description: OverviewTron 2.0: Killer App is an Xbox-exclusive adaptation of the PC game Tron 2.0 with additional emphasis placed on the multiplayer component. The single player component received a large number of modifications as well, primarily through having levels restructured and edited. Despite this, the core storyline remains the same as the PC game on which it is based.Full usage of Xbox Live's capabilities were central to Tron 2.0: Killer App. It was "Live Aware", supported MSN Messenger, voice chat, match making, player lists, per user data, teams, content download, auto updates and web services.There was a planned port of Tron 2.0 Killer App to the Gizmondo handheld console, though it was canceled while in development. A Game Boy Advance title of the same name exists, though it contains an entirely new adventure. Additions to MultiplayerTen new multiplayer mapsoverRIDE mode - A deathmatch mode where the players can enter and exit light cycles at any point throughout the match.Hard Ware mode - Class-based team multiplayer. Players choose from among six classes while playing against opposing teams in objective-based missions.Support for up to four players via splitscreen or 16 players via system link.
